医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
血液测试检测到帕金森的几年在使用RNA标记的症状出现之前一项新研究确定了一种基于血液的生物标志物，该生物标志物通过测量特定的核和线粒体转移RNA片段的比率来检测症状前帕金森氏病。该测试的表现优于标准临床工具，还可能反映与蛋白质合成受损相关的疾病机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/blood-test-detects-parkinsone28099s-are-before-before-before-before-symptoms-apperear-using-rna-markers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/Blood-test-detects-Parkinsone28099s-years-before-symptoms-appear-using-RNA-markers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70965cc8-380f-4A2C-884C-2A739CC1DB26 Mon, 14 Apr 2025 20:42:00 -0400 Blood test detects Parkinson’s years before symptoms appear using RNA markers
Z Gen订购的在线外卖比老年人多6倍 - 年龄如何重塑全球饮食习惯在过去一个月中，五个国家 /地区的成年人中有超过一半使用在线食品零售平台，在墨西哥和美国的使用率最高。年轻的成年人，男性，少数民族和有孩子的家庭更有可能在线订购食物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/gen-z-orders-6x-more-takeout-online-than-seniorse28094how-age-reshapes-reshapes-global-food-habits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/gen-z-orders-6x-more-takeout-online-than-seniorse28094how-age-reshapes-reshapes-global-food-habits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c0332b8-b6c8-41f0-a0d1-a0d1-9ccbb6d21ad8 Mon, 14 Apr 2025 20:14:00 -0400 Gen Z orders 6x more takeout online than seniors—how age reshapes global food habits
为什么麻疹又回到美国以及医生现在必须知道的麻疹正在使美国令人不安的卷土重来，这是由于疫苗接种率下降和疫苗不断上升的推动。小儿传染病专家提供临床指导，以帮助医疗保健提供者在当今爆发的环境中识别，管理和预防麻疹。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/why-measles-is-is-back-in-the-us-and-what-what-doctors-must-must-now-now.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/why-measles-is-is-back-in-the-us-and-what--------------------------what-doctors-must-must-know-now.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c154c36-ee41-441b-8dff-312f71b8e353 Mon, 14 Apr 2025 19:37:00 -0400 Why measles is back in the U.S. and what doctors must know now
心脏病发作后的早期组合疗法降低了复发和死亡的风险心血管疾病是迄今为止全球死亡的最常见原因，心肌梗塞是最常见的急性事件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/early-combination-combination-therapy-theraphy-hert-hernt-attack-redaces-risk----------------of-of-recurrence-enderrence-and-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/early-combination-combination-therapy-thert-hert-hernt-attack-redces-resces-risk-risk-frecurrence-frecurrence-anderrence-and-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80993219-7787-4B9B-9391-19B23772F16D Mon, 14 Apr 2025 12:32:22 -0400 Early combination therapy after heart attack reduces risk of recurrence and death
怀孕并发症可能预测未来心脏病的风险美国心脏病学杂志JACC发表的新研究，妊娠期间的并发症（或不良怀孕结局），例如妊娠糖尿病和新发展的高血压，充当大自然的压力测试，并可能发现个人患心脏病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/pregnancy-complemations-may-predict-future-future-hend-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/pregnancy-complemations-may-predict-future-future-future-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30f3d2ca-6C95-49FF-88DB-829B11065A61 Mon, 14 Apr 2025 12:10:08 -0400 Pregnancy complications may predict future heart disease risk
科学家确定了阿尔茨海默氏病中星形胶质细胞GABA生产的关键酶基础科学研究所（IBS）的研究小组确定了先前未知的酶SIRT2，该酶在与阿尔茨海默氏病（AD）相关的记忆丧失中起关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/scientists-sideify-critical-critical-enzymes-for-astrocytic-gaba-prododuction-in-alzheimere280999s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/scientists-sideify-critical-critical-enzymes-for-astrocytic-gaba-prododuction-in-alzheimere280999s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d307bb8-9067-4f3d-8c10-6cfb64585769 Mon, 14 Apr 2025 10:23:41 -0400 Scientists identify critical enzymes for astrocytic GABA production in Alzheimer’s disease
科学家将自闭症中的社会挑战追溯到特定的大脑巡回赛Unige科学家确定了一个脑电路，其中是自闭症患者遇到的社会困难的起源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/scientists-trace-trace-social-challenges-in-autism-to-crain-brain-circuit.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/Scientists-trace-trace-social-challenges-in-autism-to-specific-brain-circuit.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eeb8eb810-71C0-4352-AEB4-863B444C1D514 Mon, 14 Apr 2025 09:59:32 -0400 Scientists trace social challenges in autism to specific brain circuit
压力和抑郁有助于解释相互交织的酒精，睡眠问题失眠和危险饮酒是如此紧密地交织在一起，以至于估计表明至少有三分之一，多达91％的人在睡眠困难时也滥用酒精。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/stress-and-depression-help-ecplain-inplain-inplain-intertwined-alcohol-sleep-problemss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/sress-and-depression-help-ecplain-inplain-intertwined-alcohol-sleep-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97cd8e06-26bb-4ddf-ab4e-7f40a5c9e14f Mon, 14 Apr 2025 09:27:46 -0400 Stress and depression help explain intertwined alcohol, sleep problems
多维睡眠健康与更好的心脏代谢结果有关健康的睡眠包括多个组件，例如每晚睡眠时间，入睡需要多长时间，白天运作和自我报告的睡眠满意度以及解决这些不同的睡眠维度可能有助于减少心脏代谢的健康和相关风险因素，根据今天发表的新美国心脏协会的循环：心血管质量和肠道质量和估计。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/multidimensional-sleep-health-chealth-chealth-card-to-better-cardimetabolic outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/multidimensional-sleep-health-nealth-clink-to-better-cardimetimetabolic outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2076473-24ce-4A08-8606-65E1D6A5C4E9 Mon, 14 Apr 2025 06:53:23 -0400 Multidimensional sleep health linked to better cardiometabolic outcomes
自闭症与大脑和行为改变有关的肠道失衡一项新的USC研究表明，自闭症儿童的肠道失衡可能会在消化系统中造成代谢产生不平衡 - 最终破坏了神经递质的产生并影响行为症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/Gut-imbalances-in-autism-linked-to-brain-and-behavior-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/gut-mmbalances-in-autism-linked-to-brain-brain-and-behavior-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0698640-507a-41E3-A38C-649938411F95 Mon, 14 Apr 2025 06:31:34 -0400 Gut imbalances in autism linked to brain and behavior changes
